content: **note digital pattern only this is not a finished product ** difficulty easy language english approx 7cm tall using yarn in size #2 sport/fine and 2 20mm crochet hook this is the updated version white egg pattern added latest version jan 2024 important this pattern is for personal use only any portion may not be reproduced or used in any manner however you may sell the finished product in small mass and credit hook & yarn if you have questions or feedbacks feel free to contact me thank you
